en.about-title: I'm a Software Engineer and creator of things
about-description: Hey! Thank you for visiting my site. I'm Luis üòÉ.
About 12 years ago, I launched my first blog, sharing tech tutorials, which interested me in HTML and CSS. At that time, I had no idea that this decision would significantly shape my life.
Since then, I've been privileged to work as a software engineer at Intel, collaborate with a range of small companies, and develop several side projects.
At Intel, I currently work as a Site Reliability Engineer, focusing on developing and maintaining distributed systems at scale.
As a consultant, I have guided businesses in optimizing their web design, enhancing marketing campaigns, and streamlining automation functionalities.
Lastly, I've created a range of side projects in areas such as media, career development tools, remote work, and a couple of SaaS initiatives.
I created this site to share what I make and learn along the way.  Happy to connect!
